title: Launch of the Innovators' Guild Mentorship Program
content: We are excited to announce the launch of our Mentorship Program, connecting entrepreneurs with experts from across industries

title: Skill Development Programs to grow
content: This collaboration will allow us to provide our members with exclusive opportunities for joint ventures, startup funding, and high-level networking.

title: Zolve Secures $100 Million in Series C Funding
content: Zolve, a fintech startup offering seamless banking services to Indians living abroad, has raised $100 million in its Series C funding round.

title: Upcoming Webinars on Entrepreneurship
content: We are thrilled to announce a series of webinars and online workshops aimed at helping startups thrive in today’s fast-paced environment.

title: New Guild Co-Working Space for Collaborations
content: In response to increasing demand, we’re launching a state-of-the-art co-working space designed to foster collaboration, creativity, and growth..
